official_title: Phase I Open Label, Multi-center Study to Characterize the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Intravenously Administered MIK665, a Mcl-1 Inhibitor, in Patients With Refractory or Relapsed Lymphoma or Multiple Myeloma
inclusion_criteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Age â‰¥ 18 years.
* Histologically confirmed lymphoma (WHO classification), or confirmed MM (IMWG), that is relapsed and/or refractory.
* Other Inclusion Criteria May Apply.

Exclusion Criteria

* Known history of chronic liver disease
* History of chronic pancreatitis.
* Prior treatment with Mcl-1 inhibitor.
* Other Exclusion Criteria May Apply.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
